definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: fillet or ring clasping (binding) a pillar of the tabernacle, only pl. sf. [[חֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם]] Ex 27:10 + 5 t.; [[חֲשׁוּקַיהֶם]] Ex 38:12, Ex 38:17; those of the pillars at door of tabernacle ([[הָאׂהֶל]]) were overlaid with gold Ex 36:38; those of the pillars of the court with silver Ex 27:10, Ex 27:11, Ex 38:10, Ex 38:11, Ex 38:12, Ex 38:17, Ex 38:19 (all P), v. Di on Ex 27:10; > Thes and most who understand of connecting-rods, joining tops of pillars, from which curtains were hung.
